name: Kat Joy Plam
coverLetter:
I'm looking for an entry-level opportunity in the Portland, Oregon area to gain hands-on experience working with the marijuana plant. I have the following qualifications: 

- Ability to focus on a task for a long period
- Ability to produce with accuracy and consistency
- Willingness to assist growers as needed
- Trustworthiness
- A sincere passion for the cannabis industry
- A strong desire to gain experience and knowledge around growing and harvesting cannabis
